name: 1st Edition 'Mah Jong' Sofa by Hans Hopfer for Roche Bobois, France

condition.details: Wear consistent with age and use. Minor fading. Lots of wear and fading (many hairs of the the Mohair velvet has worn and is gone. the base fabric is still strong). Some stains. Two small tears in one of the cushions.

specifications.rawSpecificationsHTML: Introducing the 1st Edition 'Mah Jong' sofa by Hans Hopfer for Roche Bobois — a timeless masterpiece of modern design and luxurious comfort. The fabric is still strong but the Mohair has gone on some places due to use. The sofa is still good to use but for the vintage lover. We offer reupholstery on request. Please ask us about the possibilities. Designer: Hans Hopfer Manufacturer: Roche Bobois Model: 1st edition Mah Jong sectional modular sofa Design period: 1970’s Date of manufacturing: circa 1970 Size WDH in cm: per section approximately 95x95x70 Seat height with two stacked seat cushions 39 cm. Single seat cushion height 19.5 cm. Material: original dark brown Mohair velvet / Foam Condition: Fair. Much wear and fading. Some stains and two small tears. Although the base fabric is still strong, much of the Mohair velvet has worn away. Introducing the 1st Edition Mah Jong Sofa by Roche Bobois — a timeless masterpiece of modern design and luxurious comfort. Crafted with unparalleled artistry, this iconic modular seating collection redefines versatility and style. The Mah Jong sofa is renowned for its bold, customizable structure, offering limitless configurations to suit any space and personal taste. Its plush, oversized cushions envelop you in comfort, while the vibrant, rich upholstery options elevate any living room or lounge. Designed by the legendary Hans Hopfer, the 1st Edition Mah Jong combines innovative craftsmanship with a bold aesthetic, making it the ultimate statement piece for those who appreciate high-end design and extraordinary comfort. Experience the perfect fusion of form and function with this unparalleled sofa, where style, comfort, and sophistication meet.
